228:1: na vibhavakṣayāvekṣayā samṛddhyāśayā vā pradānavaidhuryamupayānti satpuruṣāḥ|
228:3: bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavāṃstyāgaśīlakulavinayaśrutajñānāvismayādiguṇasamudito dhanadāyamāno vibhavasaṃpadā sarvātithitvādanuparatadānasatro lokahitārthapravṛtto dāyakaśreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhī babhūva mātsaryādidoṣāviṣahyo'viṣahya iti prakāśanāmā|
228:5: yathārthināṃ darśanamāsa tasya tathārthināṃ darśanamāsa tasya||1||
228:6: dehīti yācñāniyatārthamukto nāstīti nāsau gadituṃ śaśāka|
228:7: hṛtāvakāśā hi babhūva citte tasyārthasaktiḥ kṛpayā mahatyā||2||
228:10: bhavanti lokasya hi bhūyasārthā lobhāśrayād durgatimārgasārthāḥ|
228:12: atha tasya mahāsattvasya yathābhilaṣitairakliṣṭaiḥ śiṣṭopacāravibhūṣaṇairvipulairarthavisargairyācanakajanaṃ samantataḥ saṃtarpayataḥ pradānaudāryaśravaṇādvismayāvarjitamanāḥ śakro devendraḥ pradānasthiraniścayamasya jijñāsamānaḥ pratyahaṃ dhanadhānyaratnaparicchadajātaṃ tattadantardhāpayāmāsa|
228:15: yathā yathā tasya vineśurarthāḥ sūryābhisṛṣṭa iva toyaleśāḥ|
228:17: atha śakro devendrastyāgaparāyaṇameva taṃ mahāsattvamavetya prakṣīyamāṇavibhavasāramapi vismitataramatistasyaikarātreṇa sarvaṃ vibhavasāramantardhāpayāmāsānyatra rajjukuṇḍalāddātrāccaikasmāt|
228:18: atha bodhisattvaḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ yathocittaṃ prativibuddhaḥ paśyati sma dhanadhānyaparicchadaparijanavibhavaśūnyaṃ niṣkūjadīnaṃ svabhavanaṃ rākṣasairivodvāsitamanabhirāmadarśanīyaṃ,
228:19: kimiti ca samutthitavitarkaḥ samanuvicaraṃstadrajjukuṇḍalakaṃ dātraṃ ca kevalamatra dadarśa|
228:20: tasya cintā prādurabhavat-yadi tāvat kenacidyācitumanucitavacasā svavikramopārjitopajauvinā madgṛhe praṇaya evaṃ darśitaḥ sūpayuktā evamarthāḥ|
228:21: atha tvidānīṃ madbhāgyadoṣāducchrayamasahamānena kenacidanupayuktā eva vidrutāstatkaṣṭam|
228:23: arthināmeva pīḍā tu dahatyatra mano mama||6||
228:28: atha sa bodhisattvaḥ svadhairyāvaṣṭambhādanāsvāditaviṣādadainyastasyāmapyavasthāyāmanabhyastayācñākramatvāt parān yācituṃ paricitānapi na prasehe|
228:29: evaṃ duṣkaraṃ yācitumiti ca tasya bhūyasī yācanakeṣvanukampā babhūva|
228:30: atha sa mahātmā yācanakajanasvāgatādikriyāvekṣayā svayameva tadrajjukuṇḍalakaṃ dātraṃ ca pratigṛhya pratyahaṃ tṛṇavikrayopalabdhayā vibhavamātrayārthijanapraṇayasammānanāṃ cakāra|
228:31: atha śakro devendrastasyemāmaviṣāditāṃ parame'pi dāridrye pradānābhimukhatāṃ cāvekṣya savismayabahumānaḥ saṃdṛśyamānadivyādbhutavapurantarikṣe sthitvā dānādvicchandayaṃstaṃ mahāsattvamuvāca-gṛhapate !
228:33: na dasyubhirnaiva jalānalābhyāṃ na rājabhiḥ saṃhriyamāṇavittaḥ||8||
228:34: tattvāṃ hitāvekṣitayā bravīmi niyaccha dāne vyasanānurāgam|
228:35: itthaṃgataḥ sannapi cenna dadyā yāyāḥ punaḥ pūrvasamṛddhiśobhām||9||
228:36: śaśvat kṛśenāpi parivyayeṇa kālena dṛṣṭvā kṣayamarjanānām|
228:37: cayena valmīkasamucchrayāṃśca vṛddhyarthinaḥ saṃyama eva panthāḥ||10||
228:40: mā caiva tadbhūnmama śakra vittaṃ yatprāptihetoḥ kṛpaṇāśayaḥ syām||11||
228:41: icchanti yācñāmaraṇena gantuṃ duḥkhasya yasya pratikāramārgam|
228:43: tanmadvidhaḥ kiṃ svidupādadīta ratnaṃ dhanaṃ vā divi vāpi rājyam|
228:48: dāne nidāne ca sukhodayānāṃ mātsaryamāryaḥ ka ivāśrayeta||15||
228:50: svabhyastaharṣaṃ tu manaḥ pradānaistadutpathe kena dhṛtiṃ labheta||16||
228:51: na cātra manyoranuvṛttimārge cittaṃ bhavānarhati saṃniyoktum|
228:52: na hi svabhāvasya vipakṣadurgamāroḍhumalpena balena śakyam||17||
228:53: śakra uvāca-gṛhapate ! paryāptavibhavasya paripūrṇakośakoṣṭhāgārasya samyakpravṛttavividhavipulakarmāntasya virūḍhāyaterloke vaśīkṛtaiśvaryasyāyaṃ kramo nemāṃ daśāmabhiprapannasya| paśya-
228:56: jane prasaṅgena vitasya sadgatiṃ prabodhya harṣaṃ sasuhṛtsu bandhuṣu|
228:58: atha pradāne pravijṛmbhitakramaḥ sukheṣu vā naiti janasya vācyatām|
228:61: anāryatāpyatra ca nāma kā bhavenna yatpradadyā vibhaveṣvabhāviṣu||21||
228:65: naiti prītiṃ tāṃ hi mahatyāpi vibhūtyā
228:86: ityukte śakro devendraḥ samabhiprasāditamanāḥ sādhu sādhvityenamabhisaṃrādhya sabahumānasnigdhamavekṣamāṇa uvāca-
228:89: acintayitvā tu dhanakṣayaṃ tvayā svasaukhyahāniṃ mama ca pratāraṇām|
228:92: pradānasaṃkocavirūpatāṃ gataṃ dhane pranaṣṭe'pi na yattadāśayā||30||
228:94: himāvadātaḥ śikharīva vāyunā na yatpradānādasi kampito mayā||31||
228:95: yaśaḥ samudbhāvayituṃ parīkṣayā dhanaṃ tavedaṃ tu nigūḍhavānaham|
228:97: yataḥ pradānairabhivarṣa yācakān hradān mahāmegha ivābhipūrayan|
228:98: dhanakṣayaṃ nāpsyasi matparigrahādidaṃ kṣamethāśca viceṣṭitaṃ mama||33||
228:99: ityenamabhisaṃrādhya śakrastaccāsya vibhavasāramupasaṃhṛtya kṣamayitvā ca tatraivāntardadhe|
228:100: tadevaṃ na vibhavakṣayāvekṣayā samṛddhyāśayā vā pradānavaidhuryamupayānti satpuruṣā iti|
